item.title: What the hack is NorHaak?
item.description: Yes, that is a question we must answer first before you get to know us more. NorHaak is the name of this company, and too much thinkering has been done to compress our mission statement and raison d’etre in a single word. Nor for the northern star, as a universal guidance in darker nights, darker times. Nor is also the root of the name Mounir. It means light in Arabic.
